apiDescription: A struct providing information about a panic.
PanicInfo structure is passed to a panic hook set by the set_hook function.

description: Returns the payload associated with the panic.
This will commonly, but not always, be a &'static str or String.

methods.name: pub fn message(&self) -> Option<&Arguments>
stability: ðŸ”¬ This is a nightly-only experimental API.  (panic_info_message #44489)

description: Returns information about the location from which the panic originated, if available.
This method will currently always return Some, but this may change in future versions.
